name: Freeze-Dried in Terror
description:
Throw freeze-dried ice cream to move in zero gravity, short-circuit wires, and distract enemies. Reach the airlock before the aliens reach you.

I felt a violent jolt as something slammed into the ship.

 My spine was thrown against the wall, paralyzing me from the waist down. Then I heard the screams.

My only hope of escape is my pitching arm, and the unlimited supply of freeze-dried ice cream I keep with me...

All content created by me, except for images from NASA (public domain)
